summary: Frontend-only testing of Status Packs feature. All features working correctly: Progress Icons Gallery opens at /admin#layouts with expandable section containing 4 themes (Chinese Journey, Chinese Architecture, Celestial Path, Ink & Brush). Quick Apply Packs section shows 5 packs (Chinese New Year, Construction Progress, Nature Journey, Celestial Night, Calligraphy Master), each with 5 preview icons and 'Apply to Mosaic Community' button. Clicking apply updates icon animations via API - verified icons now have progress_journey_* animations. Students tab at /admin#unatienda works with compact table showing 27 students, Pre-sale column with toggle buttons, sortable headers (Student, Grade, School, Status, Pre-sale), pagination (25 per page), and search input. Landing page renders correctly with Mosaic Community layout.
passed_tests: Layout Preview module loads at /admin#layouts with 4 layout cards
Mosaic Community marked as Active layout
Progress Icons Gallery section expandable with 4 themes Ã— 5 levels
Quick Apply Packs section shows QUICK APPLY PACKS header
Chinese New Year pack present with 5 preview icons
Construction Progress pack present with 5 preview icons
Nature Journey pack present with 5 preview icons
Celestial Night pack present with 5 preview icons
Calligraphy Master pack present with 5 preview icons
All 5 packs have 'Apply to Mosaic Community' button
Clicking 'Apply to Mosaic Community' on Chinese New Year shows success toast
API verification: GET /api/admin/ticker/layout-icons shows progress_journey_* animations after apply

Icons updated: PinPan=progress_journey_starting, Tienda=progress_journey_developing, Ranking=progress_journey_advancing, Aprender=progress_journey_mastering, Cultura=progress_journey_complete, Fe=progress_journey_starting
Students tab loads at /admin#unatienda with compact table
Student stats bar shows: 27 students, 4 locked, 0 pre-sale, 9 grades
Students table has sortable column headers (Student, Grade, School, Status, Pre-sale)
Pre-sale column shows toggle buttons for each student
Pagination controls present (25 per page, 1-25 of 27, page 1/2)
Student search input functional
Landing page at '/' renders with Mosaic Community layout and navigation icons
critical_code_review_comments: Minor: Console warning 'In HTML, button cannot be a descendant of button' from LivingGridLanding - nested button issue in Tile component with Button child (not critical but should be fixed for HTML validity)
context_for_next_testing_agent: Status Packs feature is complete and working. 5 packs available in Progress Icons Gallery at /admin#layouts: chinese_new_year, construction, nature_journey, celestial_night, calligraphy_master. Each pack applies themed progress animations to all navigation icons of the active layout (mosaic_community with 6 icons). Pack apply sends PUT /api/admin/ticker/layout-icons/{layoutId} and updates icons with progress_{theme}_{level} animation types (e.g., progress_journey_starting, progress_architecture_advancing). Students tab has compact table with Pre-sale column toggle, sorting, pagination (25 per page), search. Mosaic Community is the active layout with icons: PinPan, Tienda, Ranking, Aprender, Cultura, Fe.
